title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing when resizing the window vertically. This issue occurs with all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames exhibit flashing.
EB: The Control Example should not have excessive flashing when resizing the window vertically. Tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should remain stable during window resizing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Run the Control Example. 
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames start flashing.
